title: Gamling's Horn (18R100)
text:
Set:	Treachery & Deceit
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man or Merry. Skirmish: Discard a follower from play to make bearer strength +4. If bearer is Gamling, you may also spot another companion to make him or her strength +4 until the regroup phase.
Rarity:	R
